original_text: On the first day of the festival, you must bring together all the people to a special meeting. And you must do the same thing on the seventh day. On these special days, you must not do your usual work. You may prepare the food that you need to eat on those days. That is the only work that you may do.
korean_text: 너희에게 첫날에도 성회요 일곱째 날에도 성회가 되리니 너희는 이 두 날에는 아무 일도 하지 말고 각자의 먹을 것만 갖출 것이니라

sentences.original_text: On the first day of the festival
you must bring together all the people to a special meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 사람들을 특별한 회합으로 불러모아야 한다

sentences.original_text: And you must do the same thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 똑같은 일을 해야 한다

sentences.original_text: you must not do your usual work
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 평소의 일을 하지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: that you need to eat on those days
